disorders.name: Depression
disorders.symptoms:
The Symptoms of depression are
Feelings of sadness, tearfulness, emptiness or hopelessness
Angry outbursts, irritability or frustration, even over small matters
Loss of interest or pleasure in most or all normal activities, such as sex, hobbies or sports
Sleep disturbances, including insomnia or sleeping too much
Tiredness and lack of energy, so even small tasks take extra effort
Reduced appetite and weight loss or increased cravings for food and weight gain
Slowed thinking, speaking or body movements

location.name: Potomac Behavioral Solutions

disorders.name: Anxiety
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms 
 Excessive Worrying 
Feeling agitated
Restlessness
Fatigue
Difficulty concentrating
Irritability
Tense muscles
Panic attacks

disorders.name: Eating Disorders
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms
Preoccupation with weight
Refusal to eat certain foods
Appears uncomfortable eating around others
Skipping meals 
Extreme mood sings
Dizziness
Fainting
Sleep problems
Stomach cramps

disorders.name: ADHD
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms
having a short attention span and being easily distracted
 Making careless mistakes
Appearing forgetful or losing things
Being unable to stick to task that are time consuming
Constantly changing activity or task 
Being unable to sit still
Constantly fidgeting
Excessive talking

location.name: ADHD Clinic
location.address: 3534 Carlin Springs Rd #5, Falls Church, VA 22041

disorders.name: PTSD
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms
Reliving the traumatic event as if were happening again 
Upsetting dreams or nightmares about the traumatic event
Hopelessness about the future
Memory problems 
Difficulty maintaining close relationships
Feeling emotionally numb
Being easily startled or frightened

location.name: The Center for Connection, Healing & Change, LLC

disorders.name: Substance Abuse
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms
Feeling that you have to use the drug regularly
Having intense urges for the drug that block out any other thoughts
Over time, needing more of the drug to get the same effect
Making certain that you maintain a supply of the drug
Doing things to get the drug that you normally wouldnt do 
Experiencing withdrawal symptoms when you attempt to stop taking the drug
Neglected appearance
Lack of energy and motivation

disorders.name: Bipolar Disorders
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms
 Increased activity, energy, or agitation
Exaggerated sense of well being and self confidence
Decreased need for sleep
Pacing thoughts 
distractibility
Fatigue or loss of energy
Feeling of worthlessness or excessive or inappropriate guilt
Decreased ability to think or concentrate

disorders.name: Schizophrenia
disorders.symptoms:
Symptoms
Hallucinations
Delusions
Disorganised thinking
Lack of motivation
Slow movement 
Change in sleep patterns 
Less interest in social activities 
Changes in body language and emotions
